name: OR_LNLG_PSTOP_PREP
description: This table contains the Postop Prep information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: POSTOP_PREP_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description: The post-op prep area for a patient.

columns.name: LINKED_LDA_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the Line, Drain, or Airway (LDA) record created from this site completion documentation.

columns.name: POSTOP_COMP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider who completed the site completion.
